transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello yes, good morning ma'am. Priyanka speaking from IndiaMART.
Customer: Ji ji ma'am please.
Executive: Haan ji ma'am, main aapse ye discuss kar rahi thi jo aapka concern 13th ko raise hua tha, usi ko lekar in details discuss karna tha mujhe aapse. Ah ma'am.
Customer: Ji ma'am.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji ma'am please bataiye.
Executive: Okay ma'am.

Yes ma'am.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji ma'am please bataiye.
Executive: Haan ji ma'am, main aapse ye discuss kar rahi thi first of all toh ma'am response rate ka humne aapko bata diya tha ki jo calls pe pick up ratio hai agar aap usko increase karte jaoge aapka response rate automatically increase ho jayega. Dusri baat ma'am, jaise abhi aap IndiaMART login karke baithe hue ho ma'am?
Customer: Nahi ma'am.
Executive: Okay. Agar main baat karu ma'am, aapka ek product hai bio growing enzymes karke. Is category mein haan, is category mein aap leads ka consumption sabse zyada kar rahi hai but ye aapke as an product mein added nahi hai jaise main dekh pa rahi thi. Toh mujhe ye bataiye ma'am, isko as an product add karna hai aapne?
Customer: Ah ma'am actually bio scoring enzyme ka hi second name hai pectinase enzyme. So I think wo add hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay, uska second name matlab aapne add kiya hua hai aur ye wala name add nahi kiya hai. Right? Toh agar isme hum ye category bhi add kar denge toh koi problem toh nahi hai ma'am?
Customer: Nahi ma'am koi dikkat nahi hai ma'am.
Executive: Haan, kyuki us category ko add karne se ma'am ye benefit aapko milega ki agar koi us category ko bhi search kar raha hai toh waha par aapka product visible ho jayega. Right? Kyuki har ek specific product ko different different name se bulate hain.
Executive: Toh mera main us product ko add kar de rahi hu aapke catalog mein is category ko add kar de rahi hu. Dusra ma'am main aapse ek cheez aur discuss karungi. Ji. Ah jaise aapka ek product hai just an example, ek minute de dijiye mujhe. Water treatment chemical. Right? Ji ma'am. Water treatment chemical aapka jo product hai ye kya aapki koi ye aapki main category hai water treatment ah ah.
Customer: Nahi ma'am actually ye nahi hai ki matlab regularly ye product nahi rehta hai. Beech beech mein aata hai toh hum kabhi zarurat hoti hai toh kabhi uski searching kar lete hain.
Executive: Okay kabhi kabhi uska search kar lete ho. Iski mapping ki mapping iska miss tha toh maine usko add kar diya ma'am abhi aapse baat karte hue. Baki mera aapse ek request ye hoga ki jaise aapka product ka jo score hai wo 55% ka hai. Matlab hamare 13 products aise hain jinme koi bhi description nahi hai. Toh agar aapke paas koi description ho specifically aapke firm ka ho ya phir kya products ke benefits hote hain aisa kuch aapne kahin mention kar rakha ho toh wo aap hame share kar doge toh hum isme add kar denge aapke catalog mein. Theek hai na ma'am?
Customer: Ma'am aapko agar jitna ho sakega main verbally aapko bata deti hu aap add karte rahiye. Ye zyada comfortable rahega.
Executive: Okay. Okay. Jaise ma'am bio size aapka ek product hai theek hai sirf specification milte hain toh mujhe ye bataiye iska target mein insect control disease control ya with control isme kya aata hai ma'am?
Customer: Ma'am disease control mein rehta hai ye material.
Executive: Okay great kya ma'am industrial hai ya technical hai?
Customer: Industrial hai ma'am.
Executive: Okay purity 100% hai ma'am iska ya 99%? Ah nahi 100% hai. Package size kya hai iska?
Customer: 5 kgs and 25 kgs.
Executive: 5 kg. Starting matlab from 5 kg right?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: 5 kg to 25 kg. Ah nahi ma'am package size mein agar hum small packing ki baat kare minimum mein toh 5 kgs hai maximum mein 25 kgs hai.
Executive: Haan toh main 5 kg to 25 kg mention kar de rahi hu jisse ye ek identification ho jayega ki hum 5 kg se 25 kg ke beech mein provide kar rahe hain right?
Customer: Ji ma'am.
Executive: Aur color kya hai ma'am iska white yellow?
Customer: Yellow ma'am.
Executive: Yellow. Aur users aur users aur applications matlab use iska kahan par hota hai ma'am?
Customer: Mainly ma'am industrial products mein rehta hai cosmetic mein bhi ho jata hai.
Executive: Industrial mein dal de rahi hu. Package type kya hai ma'am bag hai bottle hai packet hai?
Customer: Nahi ma'am bottle hai.
Executive: Bottle hai. Okay types kya hai systematic hai preventive hai aur ah.
Customer: Ah ye alag alag type ke upar depend karta hai jaise jo ka drum aata hai.
Executive: Agar main teeno mein jaise main teeno mein mark kar du systematic bhi preventive bhi aur collective bhi as per the customer preference aap provide kar dete honge?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji ma'am koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Shelf life kya hai iski?
Customer: Shelf life ma'am iski three years ki rehti hai.
Executive: Three years. Okay. Ah ye powder form mein aata hai ya phir liquid mein aata hai?
Customer: Liquid mein aata hai liquid mein aata hai.
Executive: Liquid mein aata hai. PH value kya rehti hai ma'am iski?
Customer: Ah PH value ma'am iski four to 12 rehti hai.
Executive: Four to 12. Okay. Theek hai ma'am maine ye sari kuch aapka mention kar diya hai specifically us specific product mein jo aapka abhi hum aapse discuss kar rahe the uske baad aapka just ek minute de dijiyega main aapko bata deti hu jaise aap ah ek aap ah pro excel pro excel.
Customer: Pro excel ji excel.
Executive: Haan isme kya ma'am aapka ye rehta hai insect controller ye bhi disease control hai insect controller?
Customer: Ma'am ye same hi product hai bas ye rahega ki ye brand mein aa jata hai pro excel aur jo hum pehle bio size ki baat kar rahe the.
Executive: Okay. Matlab main wahi details isme mention kar du jo humne pehle wale product mein kari hai?
Customer: Haan ji ma'am same.
Executive: Okay. Theek hai main same details aapka mention kar deti hu. Baki mujhe ek cheez aur aapse discuss karna tha ma'am. Ah just ek minute de dijiyega.
Aapke kuch aur products bhi hai jinme specification missing hai. Toh uska uska bhi agar aap mujhe bata dengi toh zyada better rahega.
Customer: Koi issue nahi hai ma'am. Ah main free hu jaise ki aap bata sakte hain.
Executive: Haan main bata deti hu just ek minute dijiyega ma'am.
Executive: Agar ma'am isme main chloride gluten ki category bhi add karu toh koi problem toh nahi hogi?
Customer: Nahi ma'am. Ah glu gluten mein ye rahega ki wo na food grade material customer samajh jate hain ya toh wo usme add nahi karna.
Executive: Okay okay. Aur chemical preservative chemical preservative aapka ek product hai?
Customer: Chemical preservative mein ja sakta hai.
Executive: Haan ye bhi same material rahega ma'am?
Customer: Iska bhi same material hai.
Customer: Haan ji ma'am same material hai.
Customer: Bas iske name hai ma'am isko chemical preservative bhi bolte hain proxl bhi bolte hain biocide bhi bolte hain material ko.
Executive: Toh ek hi product ke name hai ye.
Executive: Ek hi product ke name hai aur package type iska kya rehta hai box rehta hai?
Customer: 525 ah HDPE drum ma'am.
Executive: Drum rehta hai. Okay.
Executive: Aur grade standard kya rehta hai technical grade rehta hai bio grade rehta hai reagent grade rehta hai?
Customer: Ah nahi ma'am ye hota industrial product hi.
Executive: Okay technical grade rehta hai. Ah solid form mein hota hai liquid form mein hota hai powder form mein hota hai?
Customer: Liquid mein hota hai liquid.
Executive: Liquid. Aur industrial hai aapne jaise bola aur material bhi hai right if I'm not wrong. Ji. Ji. Okay. Theek hai ma'am maine isko bhi mention kar diya. Iske baad hum aa jate hain aapke dusre product mein. Micro bio oxide. Micro bio side. Toh ye bhi aapka same product hai?
Customer: Ah nahi ma'am micro biocide mein aapko name halka change hoga waise jo specification same hi rahega.
Executive: Type mein kya aayega type mein kya hoga systematic ya preventive hai?
Customer: Type same rahega same rahega.
Customer: Jaise ki aap teeno mein mention kar sakte hain customer ki requirement ke hisab se hum change kar lenge.
Executive: Okay customer ki requirement ke brand kya hai aapka brand hai specifically like chemical ya koi aur brand hai?
Customer: Ah nahi ma'am elizyme ke naam se aayega.
Executive: Achha brand name kuch aur hai aapka.
Customer: Haan ji aap mention karna chahe aap kar sakte hain elizyme mein.
Executive: E L I Z Y M E?
Customer: Ah E L I Z Y M E.
Executive: Okay theek hai. Package size wahi hai ma'am five to 25?
Customer: Ji ma'am.
Executive: Theek hai ma'am. Baki mujhe product ka description aap de sakte ho ki description mein kya dalna hai kyuki description mein toh aapne kuch apna subject line bana rakha hoga ki specify karke ki ye hum description mein dalenge. Toh aap mujhe aap isko aap isko preservative mein hi mention kar dijiyega. Biocide preservative aap likh sakte hain description mein.
Executive: Okay aur agar jaise aapki company ka jo about us hai jis about us mein aapne sara details dala hai us about us ko agar hum description mein dal denge toh koi problem toh nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi ma'am koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Okay aapka ek product aisa hai jisme aapne price mention nahi kiya detergent chemical iski kya cost hai ma'am?
Customer: Ah nahi ma'am isme hum mention nahi kar sakte. Ah mainly kya rehta hai ki jaise ah isme na aage specification rehti hai teen se char tarah ke iske product rehte hain.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh price mention karna kyuki sabka alag alag hai. Haan haan. Toh mention karna mushkil hai jaise ki aap nahi hai right? Ji ji.
Executive: Okay main samajh gayi aapki baat. Iske alawa ma'am detergent fragrance aur pesticide ye do products hain jinke photos added nahi hai agar aap hame provide kar paye?
Customer: Detergent perfume ki toh ma'am hum koi bhi yellow color ki bottle dal sakte hain kyuki perfume ka ab mention kar pana kyuki perfume rehte hain wo rose mein hoga toh wo red hoga lemon mein hoga toh wo yellow hoga.
Executive: Nahi koi bhi details de dijiye it's not mandatory ki aapka mainly ma'am aap prom se prom se copy kar paoge?
Executive: Nahi hum aise copy nahi karenge jaise aapka specifically aapka product hai toh aapke paas uski image hogi. Toh aap uski photo agar hame share kar payenge. Haan ji mere paas photos toh rahengi but but ma'am mere paas photos toh rahengi mere paas toh blue color ka na drum rahega jaise 5 kgs aur 25 kgs mein toh wo agar main chemical mein dalungi tab bhi wo same hi dikh raha hai aur perfume mein toh main tab bhi wo same hi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Maybe is sometimes the chemical ka kuch image hota hai aapke paas wo aap mujhe share kar pao aap mujhe share kar dijiye. Ah koi issue nahi hai ma'am hum iske bare mein baad mein discuss kar lenge please main aapko kabhi photo de dungi.
Executive: Theek hai iske bare mein hum baad mein discuss kar lenge baki meri aapse ek request hogi. Ah main yaha se aapka concern ye close karungi aur aapke paas ek mail aayega aapke registered mail ID pe please aap usse positive response dijiyega. Baki agar aapko koi query aati hai mera number aapke paas hai sir ke paas bhi mera number hai aap log kabhi bhi mujhse coordinate aur connect kar sakte ho. Theek hai ma'am?
Customer: Koi issue nahi hai ma'am. Ah mail abhi aayegi ya thode time ke baad hoga?
Executive: Nahi abhi aa jayegi thodi der mein 10 to 15 minutes mein aapke paas mail aayegi. Please aap usse positive response dijiyega. ke call chal rahi thi toh main isliye puch rahi hu ki koi aisa toh nahi hai ki abhi isse review karna kuch zaruri nahi hai.
Executive: Na na it's not mandatory to review abhi. After 10 to 15 minutes baad hum aapko mail karenge please aap us mail pe hame reply kar dijiyega positive response ke sath. Baki agar koi haan ji baki agar koi aur query ho toh aapke paas mera number hai please feel to connect me on call aur main always aapko call answer bhi karti hu aur aapko reply bhi kar dungi. Theek hai ma'am?
Customer: Koi koi issue nahi hai ma'am. Okay.
Executive: Yeah sure thank you ma'am have a great day ma'am. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Concern regarding response rate.

- Wants to add product as a product.

- Wants to add chloride gluten category.

- Wants to add photos of detergent fragrance and pesticide.

- Price not mentioned for detergent chemical.



Resolution:

- Explained how to increase response rate.

- Added the category to the catalog.

- Added mapping of water treatment.

- Executive took note of the products and details.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a mail in 10-15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, catalog, product details, category
